items.title: Welcome to Netrix!
items.excerpt: We're excited to announce the official launch of Netrix, our new mod manager for Minecraft!
items.content:
After months of development and testing, Netrix is now live! This major update brings significant performance improvements, a carefully curated selection of new mods, and quality-of-life enhancements that will make your Minecraft experience better than ever.

Key highlights:
• 40% improved mod loading performance
• 15 new mods including Create, Applied Energistics 2, and Thermal Expansion
• Enhanced world generation with Biomes O' Plenty
• New player-friendly spawn area with tutorials
• Improved anti-grief protection
• Daily events and challenges

Netrix is now open to all players! Use the new mod manager to automatically download and install all required mods.
items.author: CrashCraft Team
